channel.title: Need help with server. Please Read
channel.description:
Ok well i've downloaded the source and client for like 3 difference servers one is blank and i've tried on all of them to get it to work but it keeps coming up with "Error connecting to server" on one it came up with "Incorrect password or username" or something like that. So i need help just being able to log in offline. Unless it needs to be online to work but i'd prefer to have it offline for now.
Thanks

Right done, How do i change levels and make commands?

item.title: Need help with server. Please Read
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote="…::Tech::…, post:4, topic:415597"]go to your GUI.java folder (if its delta) and ctrl+f and type server ip

then see if it your IP is either 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1

Hope that helped a little[/quote]That depends on the base used.

item.description:
@system wrote:

go to your GUI.java folder (if its delta) and ctrl+f and type server ip

then see if it your IP is either 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1

Hope that helped a little

item.title: Need help with server. Please Read
item.dc:creator: @Joker420 Joker420
item.description:
@Joker420 wrote:

You have to run the run.bat to start the server, In order for you to get on it you have to connect to the IP “127.0.0.1” and the default port is usually “43594”. Even though your server is online, other people can’t connect until you have No-IP and your computers IP configured and sent to other people.

Read full topic
